pr_title: Make carbon.xml consistent with j2 and default values

timeline.message: Make carbon.xml consistent with j2 and default values

timeline.bodyText: Kernel will not have this class by default. What would be the behavior in that case?
timeline.author: pulasthi7
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -491,6 +523,7 @@
 	<!--Option to disable storing of tokens issued by STS-->
 	<DisableTokenStore>false</DisableTokenStore>
 
+        <STSCallBackHandlerName>org.wso2.carbon.identity.sts.common.identity.provider.AttributeCallbackHandler</STSCallBackHandlerName>

replies.bodyText:
Was not aware of it. It's there in the default.json of the kernel
https://github.com/wso2/carbon-kernel/blob/4.6.x/distribution/kernel/carbon-home/repository/resources/conf/default.json#L188
replies.author: janakamarasena

replies.bodyText: This has been added by #2685 with the changes done sts. When starting up the kernel and accessing it I did not see any errors as well.
replies.author: janakamarasena
